articles.title: World Liberty Financial rolls out lending platform for its USD1 stablecoin
articles.description: The Trump family–backed crypto venture has rolled out World Liberty Markets, a new DeFi app built on Dolomite. DOLO rose by 57% following the announcement.

articles.title: Tom Lee's BitMine Buys $76 Million in Ethereum as Analysts Predict ETH Outperforming Bitcoin
articles.description: Publicly traded Ethereum treasury firm Bitmine Immersion Technologies added to its ETH stash, now valued around $13 billion.

articles.title: Samourai Letter #1: Notes From The Inside
articles.description:

articles.title: Bitcoin loses to gold as debasement trade with BTC at 2-year lows: Analysis
articles.description: Bitcoin failed to become investors' choice as the debasement trade as BTC price action slumps while gold and silver hit repeat all-time highs, said analysis.

articles.title: Wall Street broker Benchmark says this could be a pivotal week for digital assets
articles.description: Senate action on market structure legislation could end years of regulatory uncertainty, unlock institutional liquidity and re-rate crypto-linked stocks.

articles.title: Trump-linked World Liberty brings $3.4B stablecoin into crypto lending markets
articles.description: World Liberty Financial has launched a crypto lending platform built around its USD1 stablecoin, as demand for onchain credit shows signs of recovery.

articles.title: Strategy Spends $1.2 Billion on Bitcoin, Its Biggest BTC Buy Since July
articles.description: Strategy notched its largest Bitcoin purchase in five months, following MSCI's decision to not exclude the company from its indices.

articles.title: BitMine adds 24,000 ether, but warns accumulation may slow without shareholder approval
articles.description: The largest Ethereum-focused crypto treasury firm lifted holdings to 4.17 million ETH but signaled limits ahead without authorization to issue fresh equity.

articles.title: BitGo aims to raise $201 million in IPO targeting $1.85 billion valuation
articles.description: The company has reported significant revenue growth and achieved profitability with $35.3 million in net income in the first nine months of 2025.

articles.title: Satoshi-Era Bitcoin Whale Moves $180M in BTC to Coinbase
articles.description: This is the first time the coins have moved since the summer of 2010, sparking speculation on social media.

articles.title: Ethereum set for 95% copycat rally against Bitcoin
articles.description: ETH price could rally 95% versus Bitcoin if a decisive breakout above the key 0.042 BTC neckline confirms a bullish reversal.

articles.title: Bitcoin's price hasn't peaked yet and its just a 'mid-cycle' correction, historical data shows
articles.description: The current drawdown suggests a mid cycle correction rather than a historic cycle top.

articles.title: Ether to hit $40,000 by 2030 beating bitcoin, Standard Chartered says
articles.description: The bank sees ether benefiting from sector-specific tailwinds even as broader crypto momentum remains uneven.
